name: Oleksandr
always_looking_for: Always looking for new opportunities and interesting tasks.
about_me_description_1: I am a Frontend Developer with over 1 year of commercial experience. My English level is Upper-Intermediate. I have practical experience building web applications using React, Next.js, React Native, TypeScript, JavaScript, Redux, and Vue 3. My skills include state management (Redux Toolkit, Zustand), performance optimization (TanStack Query caching), multilingual support (i18n), form validation (React Hook Form, VeeValidate), migrating projects from Vue to React, and analytics integration (PostHog).
about_me_description_2: My strengths are: analytical skills, thorough attention to detail and confidence in openly expressing my own ideas.
about_me_description_3: I have a keen interest in: implementing and utilizing industry best practices, effective problem-solving and creating efficient, user-focused interfaces.
i_am_currently_looking: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open.
